Postgres documentation - Beginners tutorial
===========================================

2.2 Concepts
------------

Starts a postgres console session with the database `mydb` 

SQL - Relational Database Management System

Unix file system - Heirarchical Database

Each row has the same number of named columns, each column is of a single data type.

SQL is white space agnostic

colon `;` signifies the end of a command

double dash `--` is a comment
